title: The Primal Question

panel_structure.description: Neural pathways glowing like ancient cave paintings, Architect dissolving into synaptic fireworks, primitive symbols floating—spirals, handprints, first marks of consciousness
Nervous system as cosmic harp, each strand humming existential frequency, ego collapsed as exhausted marionette, nervous system blooming like bioluminescent creature
Explosion into mandala of pure awareness, every nerve ending an eye, every synapse asking 'what are you?', reality peeling like infinite onion layers

transformation_notes: The three panels journey from intellectual questioning through somatic knowing to pure being—showing how 'what am I?' lives in the nervous system itself, humming beneath all language.
